LanguageData.VFEM2_ImmunizationDraught.label: immunization draught
LanguageData.VFEM2_ImmunizationDraught.description: A draught is improving this person’s immune system, making them more capable of fighting off diseases and infections at the cost of making them more sleepy.
LanguageData.VFEM2_ImmunizationDraught.stages.0.label: fading
LanguageData.VFEM2_ImmunizationDraught.stages.1.label: potent
LanguageData.VFEM2_HealingDraught.label: healing draught
LanguageData.VFEM2_HealingDraught.description: A draught is improving this person’s natural wound regeneration, making them able to heal from wounds significantly faster than normal.
LanguageData.VFEM2_HealingDraught.stages.0.label: fading
LanguageData.VFEM2_HealingDraught.stages.1.label: potent
LanguageData.VFEM2_StrengthDraught.label: strength draught
LanguageData.VFEM2_StrengthDraught.description: A draught is improving strength and reflexes of the user, improving their combat capabilities at the cost of increased social fight chance and higher mental break threshold.
LanguageData.VFEM2_StrengthDraught.stages.0.label: fading
LanguageData.VFEM2_StrengthDraught.stages.1.label: potent
LanguageData.VFEM2_EfficiencyDraught.label: efficiency draught
LanguageData.VFEM2_EfficiencyDraught.description: A draught is improving global workspeed of the user while also simultaneously slowing down their energy loss at the cost of increased chance of a heart attack. At the end of the potent duration, the user receives a major sleep fall rate increase.
LanguageData.VFEM2_EfficiencyDraught.stages.0.label: fading
LanguageData.VFEM2_EfficiencyDraught.stages.1.label: potent
LanguageData.VFEM2_PainkillerDraught.label: painkiller draught
LanguageData.VFEM2_PainkillerDraught.description: A draught is stopping the user from feeling pain at the cost of lowering their focus and productivity greatly.
LanguageData.VFEM2_PainkillerDraught.stages.0.label: fading
LanguageData.VFEM2_PainkillerDraught.stages.1.label: potent
LanguageData.VFEM2_TorturerDraught.label: torturer draught
LanguageData.VFEM2_TorturerDraught.description: A draught is causing severe pain to the user, making them unable to even move. If they are a prisoner, they will rapidly lose their resistance, and if they are a slave, they will be fully suppressed.
LanguageData.VFEM2_TorturerDraught.stages.0.label: fading
LanguageData.VFEM2_TorturerDraught.stages.1.label: potent
LanguageData.VFEM2_FocusDraught.label: focus draught
LanguageData.VFEM2_FocusDraught.description: A draught is increasing the capability of the user to learn, allowing them to gain more knowledge, eat faster, rest quicker and gain more psyfocus while potent. The effects are reversed when the draught is fading.
LanguageData.VFEM2_FocusDraught.stages.0.label: fading
LanguageData.VFEM2_FocusDraught.stages.1.label: potent
LanguageData.VFEM2_FertilityDraught.label: fertility draught
LanguageData.VFEM2_FertilityDraught.description: A draught is artificially increasing the fertility of the user. The slight boost to fertility will allow even infertile people to have a chance to become parents.
LanguageData.VFEM2_FertilityDraught.stages.0.label: fading
LanguageData.VFEM2_FertilityDraught.stages.1.label: potent
LanguageData.VFEM2_InspirationDraught.label: inspiration draught
LanguageData.VFEM2_InspirationDraught.description: A draught is providing the user with mental clarity, allowing them to focus on gaining new knowledge in skills they are passionate about at the cost of diminished combat capabilities.
LanguageData.VFEM2_InspirationDraught.stages.0.label: fading
LanguageData.VFEM2_InspirationDraught.stages.1.label: potent
LanguageData.VFEM2_StoneskinDraught.label: stoneskin draught
LanguageData.VFEM2_StoneskinDraught.description: A draught is transforming the user's skin into a built-in suit of armor. The whole epidermis thickens and hardens to resist burns, while jointed exterior keratin plates form everywhere they can - including the head and face. While it's very difficult to physically hurt someone under the effects of this draught, the plates and hard skin significantly reduces the user's physical attractiveness.
LanguageData.VFEM2_StoneskinDraught.stages.0.label: fading
LanguageData.VFEM2_StoneskinDraught.stages.1.label: potent
LanguageData.VFEM2_AmnesiaDraught.label: amnesia draught
LanguageData.VFEM2_AmnesiaDraught.description: A draught is causing the user to quickly lose memory, resulting in both negative and positive memories lasting significantly shorter.
LanguageData.VFEM2_AmnesiaDraught.stages.0.label: fading
LanguageData.VFEM2_AmnesiaDraught.stages.1.label: potent
LanguageData.VFEM2_ComaDraught.label: coma draught
LanguageData.VFEM2_ComaDraught.description: A draught is putting the user in a chemically induced coma that slows down their metabolism greatly.
LanguageData.VFEM2_ComaDraught.stages.0.label: fading
LanguageData.VFEM2_ComaDraught.stages.1.label: potent
LanguageData.VFEM2_PoisonDraught.label: poison draught
LanguageData.VFEM2_PoisonDraught.description: A draught is shutting down the user, reducing their consciousness into a state of chemically inducing coma that causes organ decay and will inevitably lead to death.
LanguageData.VFEM2_PoisonDraught.stages.0.label: potent
LanguageData.VFEM2_PoisonDraught.stages.1.label: final
LanguageData.VFEM2_PoisonDraughtDumbHediff.label: poison draught
LanguageData.VFEM2_PoisonDraughtDumbHediff.descriptio: A draught is shutting down the user, reducing their consciousness into a state of chemically inducing coma that causes organ decay and will inevitably lead to death.
LanguageData.VFEM2_AntitoxDraught.label: antitox draught
LanguageData.VFEM2_AntitoxDraught.description: A draught is improving the toxic resistance of the user.
LanguageData.VFEM2_AntitoxDraught.stages.0.label: fading
LanguageData.VFEM2_AntitoxDraught.stages.1.label: potent
